Class UsersDao

java.lang.Object
managerpro.Model.UsersDao

IUsersDao
public class UsersDao
extends java.lang.Object
implements IUsersDao
Data Access Object for performing CRUD on Users table and returning UsersEntity -objects when applicable. TablesEntity
